page.title: 11A Day in the Life of Christy
page.content: I get up at 7.35 a.m, then my mum asks me what I want for breakfast. I then get washed. I brush my hair, get my bag ready and put my coat and shoes on. When I get into school, I play until the whistle blows. We go in line by line.We go into class and do our{ {Diary and Dictionary Work}.While we are doing that,we answer the register and go into Assembly. Afterwards,in class ,we do our work. At 11.15 a.m. we have our milk and we go out to play. We then do{Maths}.I have my sandwiches at 12 noon,after which we play,then we go in and do some work, then at 2.30p.m. I go out for last play.We go back in and work until 3.30 p.m.,then I go home and watch television;then I have my tea and watch television until bedtime at 8.15 p.m.
